title: UK launches Project Octopus to deliver interceptor drones to Ukraine
summary:
The UK has launched "Project Octopus" to mass produce Ukrainian-designed interceptor drones and supply them to Ukraine in the fight against Russian drones. The project, unveiled at DSEI 2025, is a partnership where Ukraine shares the technology behind its effective, low-cost interceptor drone with the UK. In return, the UK will rapidly develop and mass produce these drones, sending thousands to Ukraine monthly.

According to UK Defence Secretary John Healey, these Ukrainian-designed drones have been highly effective against Iranian-made Shahed drones, costing less than 10% of the value of the Russian systems destroyed.

The agreement follows a £200 million investment by Ukrainian drone manufacturer UKRSPECSYSTEMS into two new UK facilities. Furthermore, other UK-Ukraine drone partnerships are emerging, including a joint venture between Prevail Partners (UK) and Skyeton (Ukraine) for the Raybird UAV, potentially for the UK's Project Corvus to replace the Watchkeeper drone.
chinese_title: 英国启动“章鱼计划”，向乌克兰交付拦截无人机。
chinese_summary:
英国启动“章鱼计划”大规模生产乌克兰拦截无人机并供应乌克兰对抗俄罗斯无人机。该项目在2025年英国国防与安全装备展上发布，是一项合作计划，乌克兰将其高效、低成本拦截无人机的技术分享给英国。作为回报，英国将迅速开发并大规模生产这些无人机，每月向乌克兰运送数千架。

据英国国防大臣约翰·希利称，这些乌克兰设计的无人机在对抗伊朗制造的“沙赫德”无人机方面非常有效，成本仅为被摧毁的俄罗斯系统价值的不到10%。

此前，乌克兰无人机制造商UKRSPECSYSTEMS已向英国的两个新设施投资了2亿英镑。此外，其他英乌无人机合作项目也在涌现，包括Prevail Partners（英国）和Skyeton（乌克兰）之间的合资企业，用于生产Raybird无人机，可能用于英国的“渡鸦计划”以取代“守望者”无人机。

title: Justice Department Announces Actions to Combat North Korean Remote IT Workers
summary:
The Justice Department announced a coordinated nationwide effort to combat North Korean schemes that use remote IT workers to generate illicit revenue for the DPRK regime, funding its weapons programs. These actions include indictments, an arrest, a plea agreement, searches of "laptop farms" across 16 states, and seizures of financial accounts and fraudulent websites.

North Korean individuals fraudulently obtain employment with U.S. companies using stolen and fake identities, assisted by individuals in the U.S., China, UAE, and Taiwan. Some U.S.-based individuals create front companies and host "laptop farms" to facilitate this. Once employed, the North Korean IT workers receive salaries, access sensitive data, and sometimes steal it, including export-controlled military technology and virtual currency. One scheme involved stealing over $900,000 in virtual currency from a Georgia-based blockchain company.

Actions include the arrest of Zhenxing "Danny" Wang in New Jersey for a multi-year fraud scheme generating over $5 million. Four North Korean nationals are charged in Georgia with stealing and laundering virtual currency. The FBI searched 21 suspected "laptop farms" in 14 states, seizing approximately 137 laptops.

The DOJ has made multiple announcements regarding the DPRK RevGen: Domestic Enabler Initiative. The FBI and other agencies have issued public service announcements and advisories regarding North Korean IT workers fraudulently obtaining employment.
chinese_title: 司法部宣布打击朝鲜远程IT工作者的行动
chinese_summary:
司法部宣布了一项协调一致的全国行动，打击朝鲜利用远程IT工作者为朝鲜政权非法创收、资助其武器项目的阴谋。这些行动包括起诉、逮捕、认罪协议、搜查16个州的“笔记本电脑农场”以及查封金融账户和欺诈网站。

朝鲜个人在美国境内人士、中国、阿联酋和台湾地区人士的协助下，使用盗用和虚假身份，以欺诈手段获得美国公司的工作。一些美国境内人士创建幌子公司并设立“笔记本电脑农场”来促成此事。一旦受雇，朝鲜IT工作者就会获得薪水、访问敏感数据，有时还会窃取数据，包括受出口管制的军事技术和虚拟货币。其中一项阴谋涉及从一家位于佐治亚州的区块链公司窃取超过90万美元的虚拟货币。

行动包括在新泽西州逮捕王振星（Zhenxing "Danny" Wang），他实施了一项多年欺诈计划，获利超过500万美元。四名朝鲜国民在佐治亚州被指控盗窃和洗钱虚拟货币。联邦调查局搜查了14个州的21个可疑“笔记本电脑农场”，查获约137台笔记本电脑。

司法部已多次宣布关于“朝鲜创收：国内促成者倡议”（DPRK RevGen: Domestic Enabler Initiative）的消息。联邦调查局和其他机构已发布关于朝鲜IT工作者以欺诈手段获得工作的公共服务公告和建议。

title: America now leads the world in surveillanceware investment
summary:
The United States has become the world leader in investment in surveillanceware, a ethically questionable but lucrative field of computer surveillance software. A report by the Atlantic Council reveals a surge in US investment, surpassing all other countries. This increase is concerning, as it undermines US government efforts to regulate the spyware market through initiatives like the Pall Mall Process.

The report highlights the growth in US-based entities investing in and reselling surveillanceware, even involving companies previously sanctioned or restricted. For example, after Paragon Solutions, a company with an ICE spyware contract, was acquired by a US firm, the stop-work order was lifted, allowing the contract to resume. Similarly, a US company acquired Saito Tech Ltd, which develops the Candiru surveillanceware tool despite the company's placement on the US Commerce Department's Entity List.

The Atlantic Council emphasizes a contradiction: US government efforts to constrain the spyware market are being undermined by domestic investment in the same technology. The increasing use of resellers further complicates regulation. The report warns that this contradiction erodes US leadership on the issue and urges the US government to address this imbalance between policy and industry investment.
chinese_title: 美国目前在监控软件投资方面领先世界。
chinese_summary:
美国已成为监控软件投资的世界领导者，这是一个在伦理上存疑但利润丰厚的计算机监控软件领域。大西洋理事会的一份报告显示，美国的投资激增，超过了所有其他国家。这种增长令人担忧，因为它破坏了美国政府通过“帕尔马尔进程”等举措来监管间谍软件市场的努力。

该报告强调了总部位于美国的实体在投资和转售监控软件方面的增长，甚至涉及先前受到制裁或限制的公司。例如，在一家拥有美国移民及海关执法局（ICE）间谍软件合同的公司Paragon Solutions被一家美国公司收购后，停工令被解除，允许合同恢复。同样，一家美国公司收购了Saito Tech Ltd，该公司开发Candiru监控软件工具，尽管该公司已被列入美国商务部的实体清单。

大西洋理事会强调了一个矛盾：美国政府限制间谍软件市场的努力正在被国内对同一技术的投资所破坏。经销商的日益使用进一步使监管复杂化。该报告警告说，这种矛盾正在削弱美国在该问题上的领导地位，并敦促美国政府解决政策与行业投资之间的这种不平衡。

title: Building my childhood dream PC
summary:
Fabien Sanglard recounts his childhood dream of owning an IBM PS/1 2168, a top-of-the-line PC from 1993, sparked by the disappointment of owning an inferior Cyrix 486SLC. Unable to afford the expensive IBM at the time, he embarks on a journey in 2024 to acquire and restore one.

The article details his appreciation for the IBM PS/1 2168's design, highlighting features like its mini-tower form factor with a handle, rounded corners, cleverly concealed drives, and the high-quality Model M keyboard often bundled with it. He also notes the comprehensive documentation and upgradability of the PS/1 compared to clone PCs.

Sanglard describes the difficulty of finding a functional 2168, particularly a 33Mhz model for optimal performance. He eventually locates a DX2-66Mhz version in Finland, complete with original boxes and manuals, and negotiates a deal to purchase it. The article concludes with anticipation for the unboxing process, teasing future installments documenting the restoration and upgrading of the vintage PC, with the ultimate goal of running DOOM smoothly. The rest of the article content will be provided in a series of blog posts.
chinese_title: 搭建我的童年梦想电脑
chinese_summary:
Fabien Sanglard追忆童年梦想：拥有一台1993年的顶级PC——IBM PS/1 2168，这源于他对当时拥有的低端Cyrix 486SLC的失望。因无力负担昂贵的IBM，他在2024年踏上了一段寻觅并修复它的旅程。

文章详细描述了他对IBM PS/1 2168设计的赞赏，突出了其迷你塔式机箱带把手、圆角、巧妙隐藏的驱动器以及通常附带的高品质Model M键盘等特点。他还提到，与兼容机相比，PS/1拥有全面的文档和可升级性。

Sanglard描述了寻找一台功能完好的2168的困难，尤其是要找到一台33Mhz型号以获得最佳性能。他最终在芬兰找到了一台DX2-66Mhz版本，连同原装包装盒和说明书，并协商达成购买协议。文章结尾充满了对开箱过程的期待，并预告了未来的文章将记录这台复古PC的修复和升级过程，最终目标是流畅运行DOOM。文章的剩余内容将在系列博文中提供。

title: Netherlands joins Ireland will boycott 2026 Eurovision if Israel participates
summary:
AVROTROS, the Dutch broadcast company, announced the Netherlands will boycott the 2026 Eurovision Song Contest in Vienna if Israel participates. This makes the Netherlands the fifth country, joining Iceland, Slovenia, Spain, and Ireland, to announce a planned boycott.

AVROTROS cited the "ongoing and severe human suffering in Gaza" as the reason, stating they can no longer justify Israel's participation in the current situation. The company also expressed concern over the "serious erosion of press freedom," referencing alleged Israeli government interference in the previous year's event.

The broadcaster emphasized that they have discussed the matter with the European Broadcasting Union (EBU). Israel's participation has been controversial for years. It's worth noting that this isn't the first time the Netherlands threatened to withdraw from Eurovision; AVROTROS considered pulling out of the 2025 edition due to reports of an unsafe environment at the 2024 event, which led to Joost Klein's disqualification.
chinese_title: 如果以色列参赛，荷兰将与爱尔兰一起抵制2026年欧洲歌唱大赛。
chinese_summary:
荷兰广播公司AVROTROS宣布，如果以色列参加，荷兰将抵制在维也纳举行的2026年欧洲歌唱大赛。这使得荷兰成为继冰岛、斯洛文尼亚、西班牙和爱尔兰之后，第五个宣布计划抵制的国家。

AVROTROS将原因归咎于“加沙持续而严重的人道苦难”，并表示他们无法再为以色列在当前局势下的参与辩护。该公司还对“新闻自由的严重侵蚀”表示担忧，并提到了据称以色列政府干预上届赛事的情况。

该广播公司强调，他们已经与欧洲广播联盟（EBU）讨论了此事。多年来，以色列的参与一直备受争议。值得注意的是，这并非荷兰首次威胁退出欧洲歌唱大赛；AVROTROS曾考虑退出2025年的比赛，原因是2024年赛事中存在不安全环境的报道，这导致了Joost Klein被取消资格。

title: Toddlerbot: Open-Source Humanoid Robot
summary: The ToddlerBot project introduces a low-cost, open-source humanoid robot platform specifically designed to facilitate scalable policy learning and advance research in robotics and artificial intelligence. Its open-source nature allows researchers and developers to access and modify the design, fostering collaboration and accelerating innovation. The robot's affordability makes it accessible to a wider range of researchers, potentially democratizing robotics research and enabling larger-scale experiments. The focus on scalable policy learning suggests that ToddlerBot aims to provide a physical platform for developing and testing AI algorithms that can generalize and adapt to new situations. This could be crucial for creating robots that can learn complex tasks and interact effectively with the real world. Ultimately, ToddlerBot's goal is to contribute to the advancement of robotics and AI by providing a readily available and adaptable tool for exploration and experimentation.
chinese_title: 幼儿机器人：开源人形机器人
chinese_summary: ToddlerBot项目：低成本开源人形机器人平台，旨在促进可扩展策略学习，并推进机器人和人工智能领域的研究。其开源特性使研究人员和开发者能够访问和修改设计，从而促进合作并加速创新。该机器人的经济性使其能够被更广泛的研究人员使用，从而可能实现机器人研究的民主化并进行更大规模的实验。对可扩展策略学习的关注表明，ToddlerBot旨在为开发和测试能够推广并适应新情况的AI算法提供物理平台。这对于创建能够学习复杂任务并与现实世界有效互动的机器人至关重要。最终，ToddlerBot的目标是通过提供一种易于获取和适应性强的探索和实验工具，为机器人和人工智能的进步做出贡献。

title: China bans one-pedal driving in default modes by 2027
summary:
This article discusses China's upcoming regulations regarding "one-pedal driving" mode in electric vehicles, set to take effect on January 1, 2027. The new national standard mandates that under default operating conditions, releasing the accelerator pedal cannot bring the vehicle to a complete stop, effectively limiting the one-pedal mode. While not a complete ban, the regulation requires users to actively select the one-pedal mode, and the vehicle must provide clear visual warnings when this mode is activated.

The article explains the difference between Type A and Type B regenerative braking and clarifies that the regulation primarily targets the kinetic energy recovery aspect of the one-pedal mode, which can bring a car to a full stop without using the brake pedal.

The regulations are a response to safety concerns, including reports of drivers mistaking the accelerator for the brake and studies showing increased reaction times for drivers accustomed to one-pedal driving. Tesla, which popularized the mode, has faced scrutiny and recalls related to this issue.

Beyond one-pedal driving, the new standard also mandates that brake lights activate when regenerative braking deceleration exceeds 1.3m/s², improving safety for following vehicles. Furthermore, ABS (Anti-lock Braking System) will be a mandatory installation for all newly certified passenger vehicle models. These regulations aim to balance the benefits of kinetic energy recovery with enhanced driver and road safety.
chinese_title: 中国将于2027年起禁止默认单踏板模式
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了中国即将于2027年1月1日生效的关于电动汽车“单踏板模式”的法规。这项新的国家标准规定，在默认操作条件下，松开加速踏板不能使车辆完全停止，从而有效地限制了单踏板模式。虽然并非完全禁止，但该法规要求用户主动选择单踏板模式，并且车辆在激活此模式时必须提供清晰的视觉警告。

本文解释了A型和B型再生制动之间的区别，并阐明该法规主要针对单踏板模式的动能回收方面，该方面可以在不使用制动踏板的情况下使汽车完全停止。

这些法规是对安全问题的回应，包括驾驶员将加速踏板误认为制动踏板的报告，以及研究表明习惯于单踏板驾驶的驾驶员的反应时间增加。推广该模式的特斯拉，也因此问题面临审查和召回。

除了单踏板驾驶之外，新标准还规定，当再生制动减速度超过1.3米/秒²时，制动灯必须亮起，从而提高后方车辆的安全性。此外，所有新认证的乘用车车型都必须强制安装ABS（防抱死制动系统）。这些法规旨在平衡动能回收的益处与增强驾驶员和道路安全。

title: Behind the scenes of Bun Install
summary:
This article delves into the reasons behind Bun's significantly faster package installation compared to npm, pnpm, and yarn. It argues that modern hardware capabilities have outpaced the I/O-centric optimizations of traditional Node.js-based package managers. The bottleneck is now system calls, the communication between a program and the operating system kernel.

Bun addresses this by treating package installation as a systems programming problem. Written in Zig, Bun bypasses the JavaScript engine overhead inherent in Node.js package managers, enabling direct system calls. This drastically reduces system calls and eliminates the complex pipeline of file reading in Node.js involving libuv and thread pools. Benchmarks demonstrate Bun's superior file processing speed.

Furthermore, Bun employs optimizations like asynchronous DNS resolution on macOS using Apple's private API and binary manifest caching. Instead of storing manifests as JSON, which requires parsing on every install, Bun uses a binary format, reducing parsing overhead and memory usage by avoiding duplicate string storage. This leads to faster comparisons and overall improved performance. The reduced number of futex calls also indicates more efficient thread synchronization, avoiding delays. The result is a package manager that leverages OS-specific optimizations and minimizes system calls for drastically faster installation times.
chinese_title: Bun 安装幕后
chinese_summary:
本文深入探讨了 Bun 相比 npm、pnpm 和 yarn 在软件包安装速度上显著更快的背后原因。它认为，现代硬件能力已经超越了传统基于 Node.js 的软件包管理器以 I/O 为中心的优化。现在的瓶颈在于系统调用，即程序与操作系统内核之间的通信。

Bun 通过将软件包安装视为一个系统编程问题来解决这个问题。Bun 使用 Zig 编写，绕过了 Node.js 软件包管理器中固有的 JavaScript 引擎开销，从而能够直接进行系统调用。 这大大减少了系统调用，并消除了 Node.js 中涉及 libuv 和线程池的复杂文件读取管道。 基准测试表明 Bun 具有卓越的文件处理速度。

此外，Bun 还采用了诸如在 macOS 上使用 Apple 的私有 API 进行异步 DNS 解析和二进制清单缓存等优化。 Bun 不像传统方法那样将清单存储为 JSON，每次安装都需要解析，而是使用二进制格式，从而通过避免重复字符串存储来减少解析开销和内存使用。 这带来了更快的比较速度和整体性能的提高。 futex 调用次数的减少也表明线程同步更加高效，避免了延迟。 最终，软件包管理器利用了特定于操作系统的优化并最大限度地减少了系统调用，从而实现了更快的安装时间。

title: Adam (YC W25) Is Hiring to Build the Future of CAD
summary:
Adam, a Y Combinator W25 company, is hiring a Founding Engineer to build the future of CAD with AI. They aim to revolutionize how engineers interact with CAD, allowing them to bring physical objects to life using AI.

The role involves developing new AI-driven CAD interfaces, designing and deploying full features, and working with the product team to create a seamless application experience. Adam is looking for someone with excellent engineering skills, a passion for models and design, and the ability to own problems end-to-end.

The interview process includes a coding challenge, talks with the CEO and a founding engineer, and an onsite paid work trial.

Adam is building a state-of-the-art text-to-CAD interface, following a successful YC launch and a first product that made CAD accessible with AI. Now they are focused on enhancing the capabilities of engineers to create complex models compatible with industry-standard software. The company is comprised of a small team of engineers, designers, and researchers who are passionate about CAD and building things. The founders are experienced, with backgrounds from UC Berkeley and major AI startups.

The position is full-time, located in San Francisco, and offers a salary of $160K - $250K with 1.00% - 2.00% equity. Required skills include Next.js, JavaScript, React, TypeScript, Python, and SQL. Adam is seeking a US citizen/visa holder with at least 1 year of experience.
chinese_title: Adam (YC W25) 招贤纳士，共筑CAD未来
chinese_summary:
Adam (Y Combinator W25 公司) 正在招聘一位创始工程师，利用人工智能构建 CAD 的未来。他们的目标是通过人工智能彻底改变工程师与 CAD 的交互方式，使他们能够将物理对象变为现实。

该职位涉及开发新的 AI 驱动的 CAD 界面，设计和部署完整功能，并与产品团队合作创造无缝的应用体验。Adam 正在寻找具有卓越工程技能、对模型和设计充满热情，并且能够端到端解决问题的人。

面试过程包括编码挑战、与 CEO 和创始工程师的对话，以及现场带薪工作试用。

Adam 正在构建最先进的文本到 CAD 界面，此前他们成功地推出了 YC 产品，并推出了首款通过 AI 使 CAD 易于访问的产品。现在，他们专注于增强工程师创建与行业标准软件兼容的复杂模型的能力。公司由一支由工程师、设计师和研究人员组成的小团队组成，他们对 CAD 和构建事物充满热情。创始人经验丰富，拥有加州大学伯克利分校和主要人工智能初创公司的背景。

该职位为全职，位于旧金山，提供 16 万美元至 25 万美元的薪资，以及 1.00% 至 2.00% 的股权。所需的技能包括 Next.js、JavaScript、React、TypeScript、Python 和 SQL。Adam 正在寻找具有至少 1 年经验的美国公民/签证持有者。

title: Man, 34, has tooth implanted in eye to restore his vision
summary:
Brent Chapman, 34, regained his vision after undergoing a rare "tooth-in-eye" surgery to correct severe corneal blindness. Chapman lost sight in his right eye due to Stevens-Johnson syndrome following a reaction to ibuprofen at age 13. Multiple cornea transplants failed due to the severity of the damage.

The tooth-in-eye procedure, known as osteo-odonto-keratoprosthesis, involves removing a patient's tooth (in Chapman's case, an upper canine), shaping it, and implanting a lens within it. This tooth-lens structure is then implanted under the patient's cheek for about 3 months for tissue to grow around it. Finally, the structure is surgically attached to the damaged eye, providing a clear window to the retina. The body accepts the tooth because it recognizes it as its own tissue, preventing rejection.

After the surgery, Chapman’s vision improved to 20/40 or 20/30. He can now read, walk without a cane, and play basketball again. The surgery is considered life-changing for him, allowing him to make eye contact for the first time in 20 years. While there's a 50% chance he'll retain his current vision level in 30 years, studies show a high success rate for the lens remaining functional in the long term. Chapman is one of the first in Canada to have the surgery. The Bascom Palmer Eye Institute in Miami is the only center in the U.S. performing the procedure.
chinese_title: 34岁男子牙齿植入眼球恢复视力
chinese_summary:
34岁的布伦特·查普曼通过一种罕见的“牙齿入眼”手术，矫正了严重的角膜盲症，重获视力。 查普曼在13岁时因服用布洛芬后患上史蒂文斯-约翰逊综合征，导致右眼失明。 由于损伤严重，多次角膜移植均告失败。

牙齿入眼手术，即骨牙角膜移植术，包括取出患者的牙齿（查普曼的情况是上犬齿），进行塑形，并在其中植入晶体。 然后，将这种牙齿-晶体结构植入患者的面颊下约3个月，以便组织在其周围生长。 最后，将该结构通过手术连接到受损的眼睛，为视网膜提供一个清晰的窗口。 身体会接受这颗牙齿，因为它将其识别为自身的组织，从而防止排斥。

手术后，查普曼的视力提高到20/40或20/30。 他现在可以阅读、不用拐杖走路，并再次打篮球。 这项手术被认为改变了他的人生，使他20年来首次可以进行眼神交流。 虽然他在30年后保持目前视力水平的几率为50%，但研究表明，从长远来看，晶体保持功能的成功率很高。 查普曼是加拿大首批接受这种手术的人之一。 迈阿密的巴斯科姆·帕尔默眼科研究所是美国唯一一家进行该手术的中心。

title: Rails on SQLite: new ways to cause outages
summary:
André Arko's talk, "Rails on SQLite: New Ways to Cause Outages," explores the advantages and pitfalls of using SQLite with modern Rails applications.  With Rails 8's Solid Cable, Cache, and Queue, SQLite simplifies deployment by eliminating the need for separate database, Redis, and file storage services.

The core difference is SQLite being in-process – the database is a single file accessed directly by the web server, removing connection errors. However, this introduces challenges: the database must reside in persistent storage (EBS, Volumes) to avoid data loss during restarts.  All data (models, cache, jobs) reside in this single file, simplifying management but potentially causing contention.

Scaling requires vertical scaling (larger servers) rather than horizontal scaling (more VMs). SQLite's default locking mechanism can create queues, addressed by the Write-Ahead Log (WAL), but WAL introduces multiple files needing coordinated backups.  Separate SQLite databases for ActiveRecord, cache, jobs, and even ActiveStorage can mitigate contention. Extreme sharding (one database per customer) is also a possibility.

Single-server architecture means downtime if the server fails and requires proxy-based load balancing.  Tools like Sequel and DuckDB facilitate database migration. Geographic limitations exist, although CDNs can still improve content delivery.

For backup and replication, Litestream streams write-ahead log entries to S3-compatible storage, enabling database restoration. LiteFS offers full replication using a FUSE-based filesystem, but introduces caveats such as stale reads and potential data loss.
chinese_title: 在 SQLite 上运行 Rails：导致服务中断的新方法
chinese_summary:
André Arko 的演讲《Rails on SQLite：引发故障的新方式》探讨了在现代 Rails 应用程序中使用 SQLite 的优势和陷阱。借助 Rails 8 的 Solid Cable、Cache 和 Queue，SQLite 通过消除对独立数据库、Redis 和文件存储服务的需求来简化部署。

核心区别在于 SQLite 是进程内的——数据库是一个由 Web 服务器直接访问的单个文件，消除了连接错误。然而，这带来了挑战：数据库必须驻留在持久存储（EBS、卷）中，以避免重启期间的数据丢失。所有数据（模型、缓存、作业）都驻留在这个单个文件中，简化了管理，但也可能导致争用。

扩展需要纵向扩展（更大的服务器），而不是横向扩展（更多的 VM）。SQLite 的默认锁定机制会创建队列，这可以通过预写日志 (WAL) 来解决，但 WAL 引入了需要协调备份的多个文件。为 ActiveRecord、缓存、作业，甚至 ActiveStorage 使用单独的 SQLite 数据库可以缓解争用。极端的碎片化（每个客户一个数据库）也是一种可能性。

单服务器架构意味着如果服务器发生故障会停机，并且需要基于代理的负载平衡。Sequel 和 DuckDB 等工具可以促进数据库迁移。存在地理限制，尽管 CDN 仍然可以改善内容交付。

对于备份和复制，Litestream 将预写日志条目流式传输到与 S3 兼容的存储，从而实现数据库恢复。LiteFS 提供使用基于 FUSE 的文件系统的完整复制，但引入了诸如陈旧读取和潜在数据丢失等注意事项。

title: Bulletproof host Stark Industries evades EU sanctions
summary:
This article details how bulletproof hosting provider Stark Industries, a known source of Kremlin-linked cyberattacks and disinformation, evaded EU sanctions imposed in May 2025. The EU sanctioned PQ Hosting and its owners, the Neculiti brothers, Stark's main conduits to the internet, for supporting Russia's hybrid warfare.

However, Stark Industries anticipated the sanctions and rebranded as the[.]hosting, managed by Dutch entity WorkTitans BV. The Neculiti brothers also transferred assets to PQ Hosting Plus S.R.L., a new Moldovan company linked to them.

The report highlights the involvement of MIRhosting, another Netherlands-based hosting provider, operated by Andrey Nesterenko. MIRhosting was identified in 2024 as a critical pillar of Stark's network and appears to be the new home for Stark Industries. Employees of MIRhosting manage both the[.]hosting and WorkTitans.

WorkTitans BV, doing business as Misfits Media and WT Hosting, was founded by Youssef Zinad, linked to MIRhosting through LinkedIn activity and previous communication with Nesterenko. Zinad is also listed as the founder of the[.]hosting, hosted by PQ Hosting Plus S.R.L.

The article concludes that the EU sanctions were ineffective, as Stark's infrastructure remained operational, services were quickly re-established under new branding, and ownership was obfuscated.
chinese_title: 防弹主机斯塔克工业避开欧盟制裁
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了防弹主机提供商斯塔克工业（Stark Industries）如何规避欧盟于2025年5月实施的制裁。斯塔克工业是与克里姆林宫有关联的网络攻击和虚假信息的已知来源。欧盟制裁了PQ Hosting及其所有者Neculiti兄弟，他们是斯塔克工业连接互联网的主要渠道，因为他们支持俄罗斯的混合战争。

然而，斯塔克工业预料到了制裁，并更名为the[.]hosting，由荷兰实体WorkTitans BV管理。Neculiti兄弟还将资产转移到了PQ Hosting Plus S.R.L.，这是一家与他们有关联的摩尔多瓦新公司。

该报告强调了MIRhosting的参与，MIRhosting是另一家位于荷兰的主机提供商，由Andrey Nesterenko运营。MIRhosting在2024年被确定为斯塔克网络的重要支柱，并且似乎是斯塔克工业的新家。MIRhosting的员工管理着the[.]hosting和WorkTitans。

WorkTitans BV以Misfits Media和WT Hosting的名义开展业务，由Youssef Zinad创立，通过LinkedIn活动和之前与Nesterenko的沟通，Youssef Zinad与MIRhosting有关联。Zinad也被列为the[.]hosting的创始人，该网站由PQ Hosting Plus S.R.L.托管。

文章总结称，欧盟的制裁并未奏效，因为斯塔克的基础设施仍然在运行，服务在新的品牌下迅速重建，并且所有权被混淆。

title: Ten Years of D3D12
summary:
This article reflects on the ten years since the release of Direct3D 12 (D3D12) with Windows 10. While D3D12 has been the longest-lasting major version, it has received numerous updates. These include significant features such as DXR and Work Graphs, alongside smaller enhancements and HLSL updates.

The article then dives into specific additions to the core D3D12 API:

*   **Programmable Sample Points:** Allows custom MSAA subsample positions, useful for niche cases and software VRS.
*   **View Instancing:** Facilitates stereo rendering for VR/3D by instancing draws and providing a view ID to shaders.
*   **Depth Bounds Test:** Allows setting depth bounds for pixel depth tests, useful for older deferred rendering techniques.
*   **Variable Rate Shading (VRS):** Reduces pixel shader thread count by varying the shading rate per draw, primitive, or tile.
*   **Relaxed Format Casting:** Removes the need for TYPELESS formats when creating multiple compatible views of a texture.
*   **Directly Writing To Block-Compressed Formats:** Enables direct writing to BC-formatted textures via UAVs, eliminating intermediary copies.
*   **Writable R9G9B9E5 Textures:** Allows GPUs to directly write to the R9G9B9E5 format through RTVs or typed UAVs, potentially offering higher precision than R11G11B10 in specific scenarios.
*   **WriteBufferImmediate and OpenExistingHeapFromAddress:** APIs for gathering debugging information ("breadcrumbs") when the GPU crashes.
*   **GPU Upload Heaps:** Leverages Resizable BAR to allow the CPU to directly update resources in VRAM without GPU copies.
*   **ExecuteIndirect Incrementing Constant:** Provides an implicit incrementing constant buffer value to shaders for each draw or dispatch.
*   **Sampler Feedback:** Lets developers determine which texels were accessed, useful for sparse virtual textures.

The article notes the complexities and limitations of some features, and how they are supported by different hardware vendors.
chinese_title: D3D12十年
chinese_summary:
本文回顾了Windows 10发布以来Direct3D 12 (D3D12)的十年历程。D3D12是历时最长的主版本，并获得了多次更新，包括DXR和Work Graphs等重要功能，以及较小的增强功能和HLSL更新。

接下来，本文深入探讨了D3D12 API的核心新增功能：

*   **可编程采样点:** 允许自定义MSAA子采样位置，适用于特殊情况和软件VRS。
*   **视口实例化:** 通过实例化绘制并向着色器提供视图ID，从而促进VR/3D的立体渲染。
*   **深度范围测试:** 允许设置像素深度测试的深度范围，适用于较旧的延迟渲染技术。
*   **可变速率着色 (VRS):** 通过改变每个绘制、图元或瓦片的着色率来减少像素着色器线程数。
*   **放宽格式转换:** 创建纹理的多个兼容视图时，不再需要TYPELESS格式。
*   **直接写入块压缩格式:** 允许通过UAV直接写入BC格式纹理，从而消除中间复制。
*   **可写R9G9B9E5纹理:** 允许GPU通过RTV或类型化的UAV直接写入R9G9B9E5格式，在特定情况下可能提供比R11G11B10更高的精度。
*   **WriteBufferImmediate和OpenExistingHeapFromAddress:** 用于在GPU崩溃时收集调试信息（“面包屑”）的API。
*   **GPU上传堆:** 利用Resizable BAR，允许CPU直接更新VRAM中的资源，而无需GPU复制。
*   **ExecuteIndirect递增常量:** 为每次绘制或分派向着色器提供隐式递增的常量缓冲区值。
*   **采样器反馈:** 允许开发者确定访问了哪些纹素，适用于稀疏虚拟纹理。

文章指出了一些功能的复杂性和局限性，以及不同硬件厂商对这些功能的支持情况。

title: Gene-edited pancreatic cells transplanted into a patient with type 1 diabetes
summary:
This WIRED article discusses a promising development in type 1 diabetes treatment: the successful implantation of gene-edited pancreatic cells into a patient. Researchers used CRISPR-Cas12b technology to modify islet cells from a deceased donor, making them "hypoimmune" or invisible to the recipient's immune system. This eliminated the need for immunosuppressant drugs, which carry significant risks.

The study, published in The New England Journal of Medicine, details how the edited cells were implanted into the patient's forearm. After 12 weeks, no rejection signs were observed, and the cells were confirmed to be functional, secreting insulin in response to glucose levels. This represents a major step towards controlling diabetes without insulin injections.

While only one patient was involved and the cell dosage was low, the research's significance lies in the potential of immune-camouflaging gene edits. The long-term goal is to apply these edits to stem cells, which can then differentiate into insulin-secreting islet cells. This could offer a regenerative medicine solution for type 1 diabetes.

Despite some criticisms regarding the replicability of the results and the current study's limitations, the findings represent a promising advancement in the field, offering hope for future clinical trials and ultimately, a potential cure for type 1 diabetes. Sana Biotechnology, the company that developed the treatment, plans to conduct further trials next year.
chinese_title: 基因编辑的胰腺细胞移植到一名1型糖尿病患者体内
chinese_summary: 基因编辑胰腺细胞植入为1型糖尿病治疗带来希望

title: From burner phones to decks of cards: NYC teens adjusting to the smartphone ban
summary:
The article explores how New York City teens are adjusting to the recent statewide smartphone ban in schools. Students are finding creative ways to cope with disconnected days, turning to lower-tech alternatives like Polaroid cameras, walkie-talkies, decks of cards, and even transistor radios. Some are using older technology like "digicams" and exploring the use of MP3 players. The ban seems to be encouraging more socializing and face-to-face interaction among students, with hallways and lunchrooms becoming more lively.

Despite the ban, some students are finding workarounds, such as using "fake phones," communicating via Google Docs, and taking phone breaks outside the building. Mayor Adams acknowledged these efforts as part of teenagers' "creative spirit."

Schools are employing various strategies, like collecting phones or using magnetic pouches, which have led to challenges like long lines and students being late to class. While some students express concerns about the ban interfering with activities like college applications, others recognize its potential benefits in reducing phone addiction and increasing engagement. Overall, the article portrays a mixed reaction to the ban, with students and educators observing both positive and negative consequences and adapting in different ways.
chinese_title: 从一次性手机到纸牌：纽约青少年适应智能手机禁令
chinese_summary:
纽约青少年如何适应学校智能手机禁令：学生们正寻找应对“失联”的创造性方法，包括使用拍立得相机、对讲机、纸牌甚至晶体管收音机。一些人开始使用旧技术如“数码相机”和MP3播放器。禁令似乎鼓励了更多的社交和面对面交流，走廊和餐厅也变得更加热闹。

尽管有禁令，一些学生仍在寻找替代方案，例如使用“假手机”、通过Google Docs交流以及在校外休息时使用手机。市长亚当斯认为这些努力是青少年“创造精神”的一部分。

学校正在采取各种策略，例如收缴手机或使用磁性袋，但这导致了排长队和学生上课迟到等问题。虽然一些学生担心禁令会影响大学申请等活动，但另一些人则认识到它在减少手机成瘾和提高参与度方面的潜在好处。总的来说，本文描绘了对禁令的复杂反应，学生和教育工作者都观察到了积极和消极的后果，并以不同的方式进行适应。

title: XFN – XHTML Friends Network (2003)
summary:
XFN (XHTML Friends Network) is a straightforward method, introduced in 2003, for representing human relationships through hyperlinks on the web. Primarily intended for use in blogrolls, XFN allows web authors to define their relationships with linked individuals by adding a "rel" attribute to `<a href>` tags, such as `<a href="http://jeff.example.org" rel="friend met">`.

The XFN website provides information on using and implementing this system. It includes an introduction with examples, styling suggestions, and future potential use cases. It also offers a guide for getting started with XFN in four steps, a profile defining the values used in the "rel" attribute, and background information outlining the design choices made during XFN's development.

Further resources include a frequently asked questions section, a collection of XFN tools like the XFN Creator, and guides on integrating XFN with social networks and other technologies. The site also highlights examples of XFN usage, suggests ways to contribute to the project, and lists press articles referencing XFN. Finally, it expresses gratitude to contributors and invites feedback from users. XFN is copyrighted by GMPG, with some rights reserved.
chinese_title: XFN – XHTML 朋友网络 (2003)
chinese_summary:
XFN (XHTML 友人网络) 是一种直接的方法，于2003年引入，用于通过网络上的超链接表示人际关系。 XFN 主要用于博客链接，允许网站作者通过向 `<a href>` 标签添加 "rel" 属性来定义与链接个人的关系，例如 `<a href="http://jeff.example.org" rel="friend met">`。

XFN 网站提供了关于使用和实施此系统的信息，包括带有示例的介绍、样式建议和未来潜在的用例。 它还提供了一个四步入门 XFN 指南、一个定义 "rel" 属性中使用的值的配置文件，以及概述 XFN 开发期间的设计选择的背景信息。

其他资源包括常见问题解答、XFN 工具（如 XFN Creator）的集合，以及关于将 XFN 与社交网络和其他技术集成的指南。 该网站还重点介绍了 XFN 使用示例，提出了为项目做出贡献的方法，并列出了引用 XFN 的新闻文章。 最后，它对贡献者表示感谢，并邀请用户提供反馈。 XFN 的版权归 GMPG 所有，保留部分权利。

title: Comcast Executives Warn Workers to Not Say the Wrong Thing About Charlie Kirk
summary:
This article from 404 Media reports on a company-wide email sent by Comcast executives to NBCUniversal employees following the death of right-wing pundit Charlie Kirk. The email, signed by Brian Roberts, Mike Cavanagh, and Mark Lazarus, mourns Kirk, describing him as an "advocate for open debate" and emphasizing the importance of unity.

The email also alludes to the firing of MSNBC political analyst Matthew Dowd, who made critical comments about Kirk's legacy on air, linking his rhetoric to hateful actions. The executives emphasize that such coverage was "at odds with fostering civil dialogue" and warned employees to be respectful of differing viewpoints. They stated that employees are expected to embody company values in their work and communities by engaging with respect, listening, and treating people with kindness.

The article criticizes the mainstream media's efforts to "sanitize" Kirk's legacy, which it characterizes as including harassment and the normalization of denying basic human rights to people. Sam Cole, the author, is seeking information on how other companies are addressing the issue of political speech following Kirk's death.
chinese_title: 康卡斯特高管警告员工不要对查理·柯克发表不当言论
chinese_summary:
404 Media的这篇文章报道了康卡斯特高管在右翼评论员查理·柯克去世后，向NBC环球员工发送的一封公司内部邮件。这封由布莱恩·罗伯茨、迈克·卡瓦纳和马克·拉扎勒斯署名的邮件对柯克的去世表示哀悼，称他为“公开辩论的倡导者”，并强调了团结的重要性。

该邮件还暗示了MSNBC政治分析师马修·道德被解雇一事，道德曾在节目中对柯克的遗产发表批评性评论，将他的言论与仇恨行为联系起来。高管们强调，这种报道“与促进文明对话背道而驰”，并警告员工要尊重不同的观点。他们表示，员工应通过尊重、倾听和善待他人，在工作和社区中体现公司的价值观。

文章批评了主流媒体试图“美化”柯克遗产的做法，文章将其定义为包括骚扰和将剥夺人们基本人权的正常化。作者山姆·科尔正在寻求有关其他公司如何在柯克去世后处理政治言论问题的信息。

title: Revanced Team Gets DMCA from Spotify
summary:
The ReVanced Team, developers of the popular ReVanced patching tool that allows users to customize Android apps, have received a DMCA takedown notice from Spotify. This notice specifically targets the modifications and patches made to the Spotify app through ReVanced.

The announcement states that Spotify's legal team alleges the modifications infringe upon their copyright. The exact specifics of the alleged infringement are not detailed in the announcement, but generally, these types of claims focus on circumventing Spotify's DRM (Digital Rights Management), modifying the app's intended functionality (e.g., ad blocking), or accessing premium features without a subscription.

As a result of the DMCA notice, the ReVanced Team has removed all Spotify-related patches and modifications from their platform to comply with the law and avoid potential legal repercussions. They are actively seeking legal assistance and guidance to understand the full implications of the DMCA notice and explore potential options.

The team emphasizes their commitment to respecting intellectual property rights but also highlights the community's interest in customization and personalization. The future of ReVanced's compatibility with Spotify remains uncertain pending legal review and potential negotiations with Spotify. The team is keeping the community updated on their progress and soliciting any relevant legal expertise.
chinese_title: Revanced团队收到Spotify的DMCA通知
chinese_summary:
ReVanced团队，即热门Android应用自定义工具ReVanced补丁的开发者，收到了来自Spotify的DMCA移除通知。该通知特别针对通过ReVanced对Spotify应用进行的修改和补丁。

公告称，Spotify的法律团队声称这些修改侵犯了他们的版权。公告中并未详细说明涉嫌侵权的细节，但通常这类声明都集中在规避Spotify的DRM（数字版权管理）、修改应用的预期功能（例如，广告拦截）或在未订阅的情况下访问高级功能。

由于DMCA通知，ReVanced团队已从其平台上删除了所有与Spotify相关的补丁和修改，以遵守法律并避免潜在的法律影响。他们正在积极寻求法律援助和指导，以了解DMCA通知的全部含义并探索潜在的解决方案。

该团队强调他们致力于尊重知识产权，但也强调了社区对定制和个性化的兴趣。在法律审查和与Spotify的潜在谈判之前，ReVanced与Spotify的兼容性的未来仍然不确定。该团队正在不断更新社区的进展，并征求任何相关的法律专业知识。

title: Conway's Game of Life, but musical
summary:
This article explores the fascinating parallels between musical evolution and biological systems, using Conway's Game of Life as a central analogy. The author describes building a "melody breeder," a digital tool allowing users to evolve melodies by selecting and breeding their favorites, mirroring Richard Dawkins' "memes" concept and Savage et al.'s research on predictable patterns in musical evolution.

The author then showcases a musical interpretation of Conway's Game of Life, where cell births and deaths trigger harmonic and complementary tones, respectively, creating evolving and unpredictable music. This demonstrates how simple rules can generate complex structures, similar to how biological systems and musical compositions emerge.

The article extends this analogy to cultural phenomena like the Labubu toy craze, demonstrating how its spread mirrors epidemiological models, suggesting universal patterns in information dissemination. The author uses Google Trends data to visualize this. Drawing on Darwin's concept of "endless forms most beautiful" and Boyd & Richerson's view of culture as a shared pool of innovation, the piece posits that cultural evolution, be it music or memes, thrives on patterns that capture our attention. The author concludes by highlighting the empowering role of code in transforming abstract ideas into tangible, interactive experiences.
chinese_title: 康威生命游戏，但具音乐性
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了音乐进化与生物系统之间引人入胜的相似之处，并以康威生命游戏作为核心类比。作者描述了如何构建一个“旋律繁殖器”，一种允许用户通过选择和繁殖他们最喜欢的旋律来进化音乐的数字工具，这与理查德·道金斯的“模因”概念以及Savage等人关于音乐进化中可预测模式的研究相呼应。

然后，作者展示了康威生命游戏的音乐诠释，其中细胞的诞生和死亡分别触发和谐与互补的音调，从而创造出不断进化且不可预测的音乐。这表明简单的规则如何产生复杂的结构，类似于生物系统和音乐作品的出现方式。

本文将这种类比扩展到像Labubu玩具热潮这样的文化现象，展示了它的传播如何反映流行病学模型，暗示了信息传播中的普遍模式。作者使用Google Trends数据来可视化这一点。借鉴达尔文“最美丽的无尽形式”的概念以及博伊德和理查森将文化视为共享创新池的观点，本文认为，文化进化，无论是音乐还是模因，都依赖于那些能够抓住我们注意力的模式而蓬勃发展。作者最后强调了代码在将抽象想法转化为有形的、互动式体验方面的赋权作用。

title: NT OS Kernel Information Disclosure Vulnerability
summary:
This article details a newly discovered kernel information disclosure vulnerability, CVE-2025-53136, in NT OS, specifically affecting Windows versions 24H2 and later. The vulnerability allows an attacker to leak kernel addresses, making exploitation easier despite Microsoft's previous mitigations against such leaks via `NtQuerySystemInformation`.

The author, hieu.q, discovered the bug while analyzing the patch for CVE-2024-43511, a TOCTOU race condition. The new vulnerability arises in the `RtlSidHashInitialize` function, where a pointer from the `TOKEN` structure (kernel address) is temporarily stored in a user-controlled buffer. By winning a race condition between reading the user-buffer and the function overwriting it, an attacker can leak the kernel address. The vulnerability is triggered via the `NtQueryInformationToken` syscall with the `TokenAccessInformation` class.

This leak is significant because previous methods for leaking kernel addresses have been patched in newer Windows versions. The bug can be exploited from Low IL or AppContainer contexts. When chained with a "write-what-where" bug to overwrite the `Privileges` field of the `TOKEN` object, it can lead to complete Local Privilege Escalation (LPE). The author successfully demonstrated the exploit on a Windows Insider Preview from Low IL and AppContainer contexts.

The article also outlines the disclosure timeline with Microsoft, including an initial misclassification of the bug as a duplicate before it was finally acknowledged and assigned CVE-2025-53136. The author emphasizes the importance of thorough patch analysis and careful code modification to prevent the introduction of new vulnerabilities.
chinese_title: NT操作系统内核信息泄露漏洞
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了一个新发现的内核信息泄露漏洞，CVE-2025-53136，存在于NT OS中，尤其影响Windows 24H2及更高版本。该漏洞允许攻击者泄露内核地址，即便微软先前通过`NtQuerySystemInformation`缓解了此类泄露，也使得利用变得更容易。

作者hieu.q在分析CVE-2024-43511（一个TOCTOU竞争条件漏洞）的补丁时发现了该漏洞。 新漏洞出现在`RtlSidHashInitialize`函数中，该函数将来自`TOKEN`结构的指针（内核地址）临时存储在用户可控的缓冲区中。 通过赢得读取用户缓冲区和函数覆盖它之间的竞争条件，攻击者可以泄露内核地址。该漏洞通过使用`TokenAccessInformation`类的`NtQueryInformationToken`系统调用触发。

这种泄露意义重大，因为较新Windows版本中已修补了先前泄露内核地址的方法。 该漏洞可以从低完整性级别（Low IL）或AppContainer上下文中利用。当与“任意地址写”漏洞链接以覆盖`TOKEN`对象的`Privileges`字段时，它可能导致完整的本地权限提升（LPE）。作者已成功在来自低完整性级别和AppContainer上下文的Windows Insider Preview版本上演示了该漏洞的利用。

本文还概述了与微软的披露时间线，包括最初错误地将该漏洞归类为重复漏洞，之后最终被承认并分配了CVE-2025-53136。 作者强调了彻底的补丁分析和谨慎的代码修改对于防止引入新漏洞的重要性。

title: A Web Framework for Zig
summary:
Jetzig is a new, MIT-licensed web framework written in Zig, designed for building RESTful APIs and web applications with a focus on speed and ease of use. It offers file-based routing that maps directly to Zig functions and supports HTML templating using Zmpl, offering layouts, partials, inheritance, and static content rendering. By default, endpoints render JSON, simplifying API development.

Key features include:

*   **Performance:** Built on `http.zig` for efficient and scalable operation.
*   **Tooling:** CLI tools for project creation and component management.
*   **Middleware:** Customizable middleware chain for request/response manipulation, including built-in support for htmx.
*   **Sessions:** Out-of-the-box support for cookies, user sessions, and header management.
*   **Database Layer:** JetQuery provides a powerful and flexible database interaction layer.

Jetzig is open source and community-driven, with an active Discord server for support. Documentation and examples are available to help users get started.
chinese_title: Zig 的 Web 框架
chinese_summary:
Jetzig 是一个使用 Zig 编写的全新、MIT 许可的 Web 框架，专为构建 RESTful API 和 Web 应用程序而设计，注重速度和易用性。它提供基于文件的路由，直接映射到 Zig 函数，并支持使用 Zmpl 的 HTML 模板，提供布局、局部模板、继承和静态内容渲染。默认情况下，端点渲染 JSON，从而简化 API 开发。

主要功能包括：

*   **性能：** 构建于 `http.zig` 之上，实现高效且可扩展的运行。
*   **工具：** CLI 工具，用于项目创建和组件管理。
*   **中间件：** 可定制的中间件链，用于请求/响应处理，包括对 htmx 的内置支持。
*   **会话：** 开箱即用的 cookie、用户会话和标头管理支持。
*   **数据库层：** JetQuery 提供强大而灵活的数据库交互层。

Jetzig 是开源且社区驱动的，拥有活跃的 Discord 服务器提供支持。文档和示例可帮助用户快速入门。

title: ‘Robber bees’ invade apiarist’s shop in attempted honey heist
summary:
In Terrace, B.C., beekeeper Christine McDonald of Rushing River Apiaries experienced an unusual "robbery" when thousands of "robber bees" invaded her shop in late August, seeking honey due to dwindling natural resources. This is the first time McDonald has seen robber bees targeting her indoor shop, a situation that initially frightened her. These bees, driven by scarcity in late summer and early fall, typically attack weaker beehives to steal honey.

The bees gained entry through cracks in the shop door, and after finding a food source, likely used a "waggle dance" to inform other bees. McDonald managed to save most of her honey and equipment by covering them with tarps and lids. She then cleverly trapped the bees in her bathroom using light as a lure and later released them, but it took several days for them to stop returning.

Honeybee scientist Alison McAfee explains that robber bee behavior is common when nectar-producing flowers become scarce and bee populations peak, leading some colonies to invade weaker ones. She also highlights that wasps can similarly target honeybee colonies for sugary substances. McDonald believes the bees' desperation is higher this year due to prolonged heat. She advises other beekeepers to ensure their bees are well-fed to prevent robbing behavior.
chinese_title: “强盗蜂”入侵养蜂人商店，企图盗取蜂蜜
chinese_summary:
在卑诗省特勒斯，Rushing River Apiaries的养蜂人克里斯汀·麦克唐纳在八月末经历了一场罕见的“抢劫”——数千只“盗蜂”入侵了她的商店，因自然资源匮乏而寻觅蜂蜜。这是麦克唐纳首次看到盗蜂以她室内商店为目标，最初的情况让她感到害怕。这些蜜蜂在夏末和初秋因资源稀缺而驱使，通常会攻击较弱的蜂箱以窃取蜂蜜。

这些蜜蜂通过商店门上的裂缝进入，在找到食物来源后，可能使用了“摇摆舞”来告知其他蜜蜂。麦克唐纳通过用防水布和盖子盖住大部分蜂蜜和设备来保护它们。然后，她巧妙地利用光作为诱饵将蜜蜂困在浴室里，之后将它们释放，但它们花了几天时间才停止返回。

蜜蜂科学家艾莉森·麦卡菲解释说，当产蜜花朵变得稀少，蜜蜂数量达到顶峰时，盗蜂行为很常见，导致一些蜂群入侵较弱的蜂群。她还强调，黄蜂也可能以蜜蜂的蜂群为目标，寻找含糖物质。麦克唐纳认为，由于持续的高温，今年蜜蜂的迫切程度更高。她建议其他养蜂人确保他们的蜜蜂得到充分喂养，以防止抢劫行为。

summary: The GrapheneOS Mastodon post states they have early access to the Android Security Bulletin. This likely means that while they can incorporate the security patches into their operating system, they are prohibited from publicly releasing the source code related to those patches before Google officially does. This arrangement allows GrapheneOS to address security vulnerabilities promptly but within the confines of their agreement with Google regarding information disclosure.

title: Show HN: C++ Compiler Support Page
summary:
cppstat is a website dedicated to tracking the support status of C++ features across different compilers and standard libraries. It provides a searchable table indicating whether a specific C++ feature is fully supported (green), partially supported (orange), or not yet supported (red) by GCC, Clang, MSVC, and Xcode. The site distinguishes between language and library features, allowing users to filter accordingly. Clicking on compiler names reveals further details about release dates and reasons for partial support.

The information is regularly updated, with the latest update mentioned as September 12, 2025. Users are encouraged to report inaccuracies or missing information.

The main content is a table listing features planned for C++26 along with their corresponding paper number(s) and support status for each compiler. The table covers a wide array of features, including reflection capabilities, standard library hardening, constexpr enhancements, additions to the `<simd>` header, improvements to exception handling, and new library features like `std::mdspan`, `std::observable`, and enhancements to formatting and string handling. The table provides a comprehensive overview of the current implementation status of proposed C++26 features across different toolchains.
chinese_title: Show HN: C++ 编译器支持页面
chinese_summary:
cppstat 是一个致力于追踪不同编译器和标准库对 C++ 特性支持情况的网站。它提供了一个可搜索的表格，指示特定 C++ 特性是否被 GCC、Clang、MSVC 和 Xcode 完全支持（绿色）、部分支持（橙色）或尚未支持（红色）。该网站区分语言和库特性，允许用户进行相应筛选。点击编译器名称可显示关于发布日期和部分支持原因的更多详细信息。

信息定期更新，最新更新时间为 2025 年 9 月 12 日。鼓励用户报告不准确或缺失的信息。

主要内容是一个表格，列出了计划用于 C++26 的特性及其对应的论文编号，以及每个编译器的支持状态。该表格涵盖了广泛的特性，包括反射功能、标准库强化、constexpr 增强、对 `<simd>` 头的添加、异常处理的改进以及新的库特性，如 `std::mdspan`、`std::observable` 以及对格式化和字符串处理的增强。该表格全面概述了不同工具链中已提议的 C++26 特性的当前实现状态。

title: MIT software tool turns everyday objects into animated, eye-catching displays
summary:
MIT researchers have developed FabObscura, a software tool that simplifies the creation of barrier-grid animations (scanimations) without the need for electronics. These animations create the illusion of movement by sliding a patterned sheet across a specially prepared image, making everyday objects into dynamic displays.

FabObscura allows users to design unconventional barrier patterns (zigzags, circles, etc.) by inputting mathematical functions, offering more creative freedom than existing tools that primarily focus on straight lines. The software supports various user interactions, including viewpoint-dependent displays and animations triggered by sliding or rotating the barrier. Users can upload animation frames or select from preset sequences and then print the barrier and image using a standard 2D printer.

The system also allows for "nested animations," where different movements of the barrier reveal different animated sequences. While nested animations offer enhanced dynamism, the researchers acknowledge that they can compromise visual quality. They provide design guidelines to mitigate these issues, such as using fewer frames and high-contrast images.

Potential applications for FabObscura include enhancing household items, creating dynamic art pieces, and developing reconfigurable signage. Future plans involve expanding the system to support video uploads and exploring the creation of 3D barrier-grid animations. The research highlights the potential to democratize animation creation, enabling users to transform ordinary objects into captivating, low-power displays.
chinese_title: 麻省理工软件工具将日常物品变成引人注目的动画显示器
chinese_summary:
麻省理工学院研究人员开发了FabObscura，这是一种无需电子设备即可简化栅栏网格动画（扫描动画）创建的软件工具。这些动画通过滑动图案化的片材穿过特殊准备的图像来产生运动错觉，使日常物品变成动态显示器。

FabObscura允许用户通过输入数学函数来设计非常规的栅栏图案（锯齿形、圆形等），与主要关注直线的现有工具相比，提供了更大的创作自由。该软件支持各种用户交互，包括视角依赖型显示和由滑动或旋转栅栏触发的动画。用户可以上传动画帧或从预设序列中选择，然后使用标准2D打印机打印栅栏和图像。

该系统还允许“嵌套动画”，其中栅栏的不同运动会显示不同的动画序列。虽然嵌套动画提供了增强的动态性，但研究人员承认它们可能会损害视觉质量。他们提供了设计指南来缓解这些问题，例如使用较少的帧和高对比度图像。

FabObscura的潜在应用包括增强家居用品、创作动态艺术品和开发可重构的标牌。未来的计划包括扩展系统以支持视频上传，并探索创建3D栅栏网格动画。该研究突出了动画创作大众化的潜力，使用户能够将普通物品转化为引人入胜的低功耗显示器。

title: Reshaped is now open source
summary:
Dima Belyaev has announced that Reshaped, a component library for React and Figma, is now fully open source. Belyaev initially created Reshaped to address the common needs of web development, focusing on aligning design and engineering while tackling UI challenges like theming and dark mode. Previously, Reshaped operated on a paid license model, which allowed for focused support and development. Two years ago, the React package became free.

Now, the complete React library source code is available on GitHub, and the Figma library is available in the Figma Community. Belyaev hopes this move will facilitate knowledge sharing between design and engineering communities. He also plans to share behind-the-scenes insights into new feature implementations, particularly concerning integration with new Figma or React releases.

Existing license holders will continue to receive full access to updates. Looking ahead, Belyaev is considering adding complex, premium components to the core library, focusing on advanced CSS and React logic, while maintaining Reshaped's core value of helping users build beautiful products and design systems. The author expresses enthusiasm and gratitude for the community.
chinese_title: Reshaped 现在开源了
chinese_summary:
季马·别利亚耶夫宣布用于 React 和 Figma 的组件库 Reshaped 现已完全开源。别利亚耶夫最初创建 Reshaped 是为了解决 Web 开发的常见需求，重点在于对齐设计和工程，同时应对主题和暗黑模式等 UI 挑战。此前，Reshaped 采用付费许可模式，从而能够提供专注的支持和开发。两年前，React 包已免费。

现在，完整的 React 库源代码可在 GitHub 上获取，Figma 库可在 Figma Community 中获取。别利亚耶夫希望此举能够促进设计和工程社区之间的知识共享。他还计划分享关于新功能实现的幕后见解，特别是关于与新 Figma 或 React 版本集成的幕后见解。

现有许可证持有者将继续获得对更新的完全访问权限。展望未来，别利亚耶夫正在考虑向核心库添加复杂的高级组件，重点关注高级 CSS 和 React 逻辑，同时保持 Reshaped 帮助用户构建精美产品和设计系统的核心价值。作者表达了对社区的热情和感激之情。

title: Intel talent bleed continues as Xeon chip architect heads for the escape hatch
summary:
Ronak Singhal, the chief architect behind Intel's Xeon server CPUs, is leaving Intel after nearly 30 years. He's credited with significant contributions to Intel's processor architectures, including Haswell and Broadwell, as well as the Core and Atom families.

His departure follows a period of increasing competition for Intel's Xeon division from AMD and Arm-based CPUs. Despite Intel closing the gap with AMD in recent years with the launch of Granite Rapids, Singhal's exit marks another loss of experienced talent for Intel's data center group.

Several other key figures have left Intel recently, including Sailesh Kottapalli (to Qualcomm), Lisa Spelman (to Cornelis Networks), Justin Hotard (to Nokia), and Michelle Johnston Holthaus. This high turnover extends to the executive level, with Intel announcing a broader executive shakeup that includes new leadership for its data center engineering and client computing groups. Intel confirmed Singhal's departure but offered no further comment.
chinese_title: 英特尔人才流失持续，至强芯片架构师离职。
chinese_summary:
英特尔至强服务器CPU首席架构师Ronak Singhal将在效力近30年后离开英特尔。他为英特尔的处理器架构做出了重大贡献，包括Haswell和Broadwell，以及酷睿和凌动系列。

在他离职之际，英特尔至强部门正面临来自AMD和基于Arm的CPU日益激烈的竞争。尽管英特尔近年来通过推出Granite Rapids缩小了与AMD的差距，但Singhal的离职标志着英特尔数据中心集团又失去了一位经验丰富的人才。

最近，其他几位关键人物也离开了英特尔，包括Sailesh Kottapalli（加入高通）、Lisa Spelman（加入Cornelis Networks）、Justin Hotard（加入诺基亚）和Michelle Johnston Holthaus。这种高流动率甚至蔓延到了高管层面，英特尔宣布了一项更广泛的高管改组，其中包括其数据中心工程和客户端计算集团的新领导层。英特尔确认了Singhal的离职，但未作进一步评论。

title: The Influencer FBI
summary:
The article "The Influencer FBI" details the unusual and concerning circumstances surrounding the FBI's investigation into the assassination of right-wing influencer Charlie Kirk. It focuses on FBI Director Kash Patel, a former pro-Trump influencer, and his social media activity immediately following the murder.

Patel's rapid, and ultimately inaccurate, updates on X (formerly Twitter) regarding a suspect being apprehended and then released drew criticism from both right-wing figures and former law enforcement officials, who accused him of prioritizing "click-bait" over proper procedure. Critics believe this behavior undermines the FBI's credibility and distracts from the investigation.

The article highlights a broader issue of political violence and the role of influencers in shaping public perception following such events. It discusses how Kirk's murder became instantly consumed by influencer culture, with graphic videos and baseless conspiracy theories spreading online.

The author argues that Patel's background as an influencer is ill-suited for leading the FBI, contrasting the need for restraint and reliable information from law enforcement with the influencer's tendency to theorize and create content. The article also points out the challenges the FBI faces, including resource constraints and personnel shifts, potentially hindering its effectiveness in solving the case. It concludes with concern that the politicized leadership is compromising the FBI's ability to perform its duties effectively.
